backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten 1–2 sentence descriptions of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style config defining global theme tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application root and main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring BPM simulation, lockout trigger, and conditional lockout overlay.
frontend/src/components/BoxBreathing.tsx: Animated 4‑phase box‑breathing component with phase‑change callbacks.
frontend/src/components/BpmLineGraph.tsx: SVG line graph rendering BPM history with scaling and optional 100‑BPM threshold line.
Dashboard UI showing BPM, graph, spike button, and rage text shield.
frontend/src/components/InterventionPane: Box‑breathing panel with looping countdown and audio‑cue integration via Web Audio hook.
frontend/src/components/LockoutOverlay.t: Full‑screen lockout overlay with entrance animation, audio toggle, intervention panel, and timer.
frontend/src/components/RageTextShield.t: A text input component that animates and clears user-entered text with a dissolving effect.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBreathingAudioCues: Generates short audio tones for breathing phases using the Web Audio API with controlled activation and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLockout.ts: Implements a timed lockout mechanism with countdown tracking and reactivation after expiration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimulatedBpm.ts: Simulates BPM readings with noise, spikes, and a rolling 30‑second history buffer.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s versioned state for an AI stress‑response app, listing architectural notes, existing features, and requirements. Captures UI, animation, BPM logic, and intervention components planned or completed.
